content:
Hi everyone at Firely,
I'm currently working on my project on Simplifier. There I get the following error "The compute network could not be reached". Are you currently working on Simplifier? If yes, can you estimate when you're finished?
Thanks in advance for your reply!
(As I know they work at Firely: @Alexander Zautke @Ward Weistra)
look much better. Thank you for your quick response!
